reviews.review_msg: Sarah is a GEM ! She cares about the success and the well-being of her students. She was more than welcoming to talk about about my class anxiety and would personally email me to see if I was okay. There is a ton of reading to do (5-6 novels, I believe), but she gives two weeks which is reasonable. Only 2-3 essays and a solo presentation.

At first I was unsure about this class because there is a crazy amount of reading required. However, the novels are engaging and interesting and Sarah clearly cares about her students. She gave everyone feedback before our midterm assignment which was very helpful and boosted all of our marks. I would take another class with her.

Very organized, the novels picked for the class are interesting and inspiring. Although she is quite vague with the descriptions of certain assignment criteria, I haven't had any issues thus far, and I've been really enjoying reading more indigenous literature, it's inspiring.
